de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Interface StateMachine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClientStateMachine, DefaultServerStateMachine

    public interface StateMachine
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state machine to control the message flow for integrity handshakes of a connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canRetry()
      Checks if a retry is possible, in the current state.
      TnccsBatch close()
      Closes the state machine gracefully using a state transition.
      boolean isClosed()
      Checks if state machine is closed.
      TnccsBatch receiveBatch(TnccsBatchContainer newBatch)
      Sends a container with a message batch to the the state machine for processing.
      List<TnccsBatch> retryHandshake(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
      Notifies the state machine about a handshake retry request with the given reason.
      TnccsBatch start(boolean selfInitiated)
      Starts the state machine and initiates the message flow.
      void stop()
      Stops the state machine.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        TnccsBatch start(boolean selfInitiated)
                 throws StateMachineAccessException
        Starts the state machine and initiates the message flow. The initial message flow can be different, if the connection was initiated by this side or a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        selfInitiated - true if the connection was initiated by this side
        Returns:
        an initial message batch or null if no initial messages must be send
        Throws:
        StateMachineAccessException - if start fails

      • receiveBatch

        TnccsBatch receiveBatch(TnccsBatchContainer newBatch)
                        throws StateMachineAccessException
        Sends a container with a message batch to the the state machine for processing.
        Parameters:
        newBatch - the message batch container
        Returns:
        a message batch or null if no messages must be send
        Throws:
        StateMachineAccessException - if the the message batch cannot be received by the state machine

      • retryHandshake

        List<TnccsBatch> retryHandshake(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
                                throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Notifies the state machine about a handshake retry request with the given reason.
        Parameters:
        reason - the handshake retry reason
        Returns:
        a list of message batches or null if no messages must be send
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if retry is not possible

      • close

        TnccsBatch close()
                 throws StateMachineAccessException
        Closes the state machine gracefully using a state transition.
        Returns:
        a message batch or null if no message must be send
        Throws:
        StateMachineAccessException - if close fails

      • canRetry

        boolean canRetry()
        Checks if a retry is possible, in the current state.
        Returns:
        true if retry is possible

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Checks if state machine is closed.
        Returns:
        true if state machine is closed

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the state machine.
